title: Carter's is having an amazing one-day sale on clothing for kids and babies
text:
Carter's is having an amazing one-day sale on clothing for kids and babies

Take advantage today of Carter's huge sale on adorable essentials for kids. (Photo: Carter's)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

When it comes to shopping for clothing for your kids, one thing you always have to keep in mind is how quickly they will grow out of everything. While you still want to get well-made apparel for your little ones, it's always ideal if you can find low prices on things that won't fit them forever. That's why Carter's is such a staple in most children's wardrobes. The retailer is known for selling reliable basics at affordable price points, and they also have frequent sales that keep parents coming back. Today is no exception, as they're offering a can't-miss discount on everything on their site.

This Monday, October 28, only, you can head over to Carter's site and take 30% off your purchase of $60 or more or 15% off orders of $20 or more by entering the code TREAT4U at checkout. It's the perfect opportunity to to stock up and save on everything the kids need for fall and winter, from cozy sweaters and jackets, to adorable Halloween costumes and holiday apparel. In addition, they're running a ton of doorbuster deals including BOGO leggings and tops for girls and hoodies and joggers for boys, as well as free shipping on all orders more than $35.

While basically everything on their site is super cute (as is the case with most children's clothes), we hand-picked a few must-have items, like this cozy Zip-Up Sherpa Cardigan and a Hooded Polka Dot Jumpsuit for baby girls, and these Half-Zip Pullover Sweaters and Dinosaur Fleece Footie PJs for baby boys. For toddlers, we're eyeing this Denim Shirt Dress and these Fringe Ankle Boots for girls, along with this Zip-Up Sherpa Vest and this Checkered Twill Button-Front Shirt for boys. If you're shopping for bigger kids, take a look at this Buffalo Check Holiday Dress and this Striped Thermal Henley.

Moms and dads (as well as aunts, uncles, and grandparents) should not miss out on this chance to spoil the little ones in your life ahead of the holiday season.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
